KillExiles.objective: Hostile rogue exiles roam Wraeclast in the Anarchy league. Slay all 13 to complete this challenge. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the kill.

FindUniques.objective: Own 90 specific Unique items to complete this challenge. Note that if you trade any away, the challenge will un-complete until you obtain the item again. Uniques in both Anarchy and Onslaught leagues are counted for this challenge.

UseCurrency.objective: Use the following 23 currency items in either Anarchy or Onslaught.

60AllClasses.objective: Attain character level 60 with each class in the Onslaught league. This challenge still counts even if a character dies after reaching level 60.

AllRecipes.objective: Complete vendor recipes in either Anarchy or Onslaught to receive each of the following items. A vendor recipe is when you trade a specific pattern of items to a vendor, not when you buy items from his/her purchase screen.

AllMaps.objective: This challenge tracks which Maps are used by you in the Map Device in either Anarchy or Onslaught. It does not count Maps that you join, just ones you create.

ClearAllDifficulties.objective: Kill all the monsters in every area of the game in Anarchy or Onslaught. You can complete this in any difficulty level. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

NotablesKeystones.objective: Allocate this list of Passive Skills in either Anarchy or Onslaught. They will still count even if refunded by Orbs of Regret or quest rewards and can be spread across multiple characters. Skills that have been allocated are marked on the Passive Skill Tree with a small green tick.

KillRareEachType.objective: Kill a Rare Monster of each of these types in Domination or Nemesis.

TagShrines.objective: Touch each of these shrines in the Domination league to gain their powers.

KillNemesisMonsters.objective: Kill Rare monsters with each of these Nemesis Mods.

65AllClasses.objective: Attain character level 65 with each class in the Domination or Nemesis leagues. This challenge still counts even if a character dies after reaching level 65.

FindUniquesDominationNemesis.objective: Own 65 specific Unique items to complete this challenge. Note that if you trade any away, the challenge will un-complete until you obtain the item again. Uniques in both Domination and Nemesis leagues are counted for this challenge.

KillUniqueBosses.objective: Kill each of the following Unique bosses.

UseCurrencyDominationNemesis.objective: Use the following 23 currency items in either Domination or Nemesis.

RecipesDominationNemesis.objective: Complete vendor recipes in either Domination or Nemesis to receive each of the following items. A vendor recipe is when you trade a specific pattern of items to a vendor, not when you buy items from his/her purchase screen.

FinishNormal.objective: Complete the Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.

FinishCruel.objective: Complete the Cruel Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.

FinishMerciless.objective: Complete the Merciless Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.

FinishNormalHC.objective: Complete the Labyrinth in a Hardcore league.

FinishCruelHC.objective: Complete the Cruel Labyrinth in a Hardcore league.

FinishMercilessHC.objective: Complete the Merciless Labyrinth in a Hardcore league.

KillBrutus.objective: Kill Brutus, Warden of Axiom Prison.

Level60.objective: Reach level 60 as a non-Hardcore character.

Level70.objective: Reach level 70 as a non-Hardcore character.

Level80.objective: Reach level 80 as a non-Hardcore character.

Level90.objective: Reach level 90 as a non-Hardcore character.

Level60HC.objective: Reach level 60 as a Hardcore character.

Level70HC.objective: Reach level 70 as a Hardcore character.

Level80HC.objective: Reach level 80 as a Hardcore character.

Level90HC.objective: Reach level 90 as a Hardcore character.

AllWaypoints.objective: Tag every waypoint as one character.

AllOptionalQuests.objective: Complete every side-quest as one character.

AllOptionalDialogue.objective: Listen to all optional NPC dialogue as one character.

AllEnvironmentLore.objective: Discover all environmental lore as one character.

ChanceUnique.objective: Create a Unique item using an Orb of Chance.

RollSixLink.objective: Create an item with six linked sockets using an Orb of Fusing.

Level20Gem.objective: Have a Skill Gem reach level 20.

Have15Charges.objective: Have 15 combined Endurance, Frenzy, and Power Charges active simultaneously.

SlayBurningShockedFrozen.objective: Slay an enemy that is simultaneously Ignited, Shocked, and Frozen.

EquipRareEachSlot.objective: Equip a Rare or Unique item in every non-Flask slot.

ShatterFiveInOne.objective: Shatter 5 monsters with a single action.

FullClearMap.objective: Fully clear an end-game Map area.

HaveThreeTotems.objective: Have 3 Totems alive at one time.

Level8InRace.objective: Reach level 8 in any Race Event.

Have9Zombies.objective: Have 9 Raised Zombies at the same time.

ResistAllElements75%.objective: Have at least 75% resistance to Fire, Cold, and Lightning.

UniqueMapFromUniqueMap.objective: Have a Unique Map drop within a Unique Map.

UniqueFromNormalTwilightStrand.objective: Have a Unique Item drop in the Twilight Strand in Act 1.

Allocate4Keystones.objective: Allocate a character's fourth Keystone Passive.

ResistAnyElement90%.objective: Have at least 90% resistance to any Element.

FullClearShipGraveyardCave.objective: Fully clear the Ship Graveyard Cave.

DelveProtoVaalBossConditions.objective: Defeat Aul, the Crystal King while fulfiling each of the following conditions.

DelveReachLevel300.objective: Reach Depth Level 300 in your Mine.

DelveMapGrind.objective: Complete 300 Corrupted Maps and 300 Maps augmented with a Zana Mod.

DelveCompleteUniqueMaps.objective: Complete any 15 of the following 19 Unique Maps on your Atlas. A Map is completed by killing its Unique Boss or Bosses if it has any. Maps without Unique Bosses are completed by opening specific Unique Chests.

DelveDeadlyEncounters.objective: Complete each of the following deadly encounters.

DelveCompleteEncounters4.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

DelveEndgameGrinds.objective: Complete any 4 of these encounters the specified number of times.

BetrayalChallenge1.objective: Successfully complete the following types of missions.

BetrayalCompleteQuests.objective: Complete each of the following quests.

BetrayalPart1ActBosses.objective: Defeat each of the following Unique Bosses.

BetrayalChallenge2.objective: Successfully complete a safehouse associated with each of the following types of missions.

BetrayalDefeatGods.objective: Defeat each of the following Gods.

BetrayalPart2ActBosses.objective: Defeat each of the following Unique Bosses.

BetrayalCompleteTwinnedMaps.objective: Complete the following Maps while they have the Twinned mod. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses.

BetrayalChallenge3.objective: Defeat any targets the following number of times while under the following conditions.

BetrayalDefeatArchitects.objective: Defeat 100 Architects in the present-day location of the Temple of Atzoatl.

BetrayalChallenge4.objective: Defeat the following targets while have the rank of Captain.

BetrayalIdentifyUniques.objective: Identify any 100 Unique Items. You can trade them away afterwards.

BetrayalChallenge5.objective: Defeat the following targets while they are associated with each job.

BetrayalCompleteCorruptedMaps.objective: Complete any Maps while they are corrupted. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses.

BetrayalCompleteEncounters1.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

BetrayalChallenge6.objective: Unveil any 12 of the following Veiled Mods.

BetrayalElderGuardians.objective: Defeat each of the following Elder Guardians.

BetrayalCompleteUnidedRareMaps.objective: Complete Rare Maps in 10 of the following 16 tiers while they are unidentified. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses.

BetrayalReachDelveLevel.objective: Reach Depth Level 270 in your Azurite Mine.

BetrayalChallenge7.objective: Defeat the following targets while they are the leader of a safehouse.

BetrayalCompleteEncounters2.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

BetrayalOpenDelveChests.objective: Open 300 Chests inside the Azurite Mines.

BetrayalChallenge8.objective: Open the following number of Safehouse Stashes in each of the following safehouses.

BetrayalUpgradeIncursionRooms.objective: Fully upgrade to the following rooms in the Temple of Atzoatl.

BetrayalAscension.objective: Use the Ascendancy Device in all 4 Labyrinths.

BetrayalCompleteEncounters3.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

BetrayalChallenge9.objective: Use any 8 of the following Scarabs in your map device.

BetrayalLevel90.objective: Attain character level 90. This challenge still counts even if your character dies afterwards.

BetrayalLevelGem.objective: Level up a Skill Gem or a Support Gem to level 20. You can trade it away afterwards.

BetrayalChallenge10.objective: Defeat the Mastermind of the Immortal Syndicate.

BetrayalComplete8ModMaps.objective: Complete 30 Red Tier Rare Maps while they have 8 mods. Maps having 8 mods is a potential outcome of Vaal Orb corruption. These Maps are completed by killing their Unique Bosses. Sextant and Zana mods do not count towards the mod count of this challenge.

BetrayalCompleteUniqueMaps.objective: Complete any 15 of the following 19 Unique Maps on your Atlas. A Map is completed by killing its Unique Boss or Bosses if it has any. Maps without Unique Bosses are completed by opening specific Unique Chests.

BetrayalCompleteEncounters4.objective: Complete each of the following Encounters.

BetrayalChallenge11.objective: Defeat the Mastermind of the Immortal Syndicate while fulfiling each of the following conditions.

BetrayalDeadlyEncounters.objective: Complete each of the following deadly encounters.

BetrayalUberElder.objective: Complete the entire questline given by Zana.

BetrayalEndgameGrinds.objective: Complete any 4 of these encounters the specified number of times.
